item.description:
The Resolution Ball is one of Boston's premier New Year's Eve events & we're going to be there, in all our Tall glory, partying our way into 2008!

Your night to remember starts with a delicious hors d'oeuvres reception (or you can opt to eat elsewhere & just join the dancing at 10pm).

After we have dined, we'll slide over to the dance floor, where the Felix Brown Band and DJ Samuel L. will provide you with Motown, 80s, 90s, and current top-40 dance & club hits to get you dancing.

As the clock strikes 12, ring in the New Year with tons of party favors and a complimentary toast from the event sponsors. Watch the ball drop on huge multimedia displays! All guests will receive a goody bag filled
with items from the event sponsors when they depart.

Dress is Black Tie Optional.
Premium Cocktails will be available.

*** VERY IMPORTANT *** VERY IMPORTANT *** VERY IMPORTANT ***

You need to purchase your event ticket directly from The Resolution Ball web-site.

NO TICKETS WILL BE SOLD AT THE DOOR!

Pricing depends on by when you purchase your ticket(s). Current pricing - valid until October 31st is as follows:

OPTION #1:

All-Inclusive Reception (8:30pm - 2am) Includes:
Entry into the grand ballroom festivities & celebrate with a cocktail reception & hors d'oeuvres reception from 8:30 - 10pm. Premium cash bar, dancing, midnight toast, cash bar, and party favors.

Only $75 until 10/31, and then prices go up!

OPTION #2:

Party Only (10pm - 2am) Includes:
Entry into the grand ballroom festivities & celebrate. Premium cash bar, dancing, midnight toast, cash bar, and party favors.

Only $45 until 10/31, and then prices go up!

Several folks have already opted for Option #1 & we're thinking of holding a pre-party "warm-up" beforehand, possibly in one of our rooms at the Westin, since some of us will be staying overnight. Will update with these details closer to the date of the event.

Please note that in order to attend the pre-party, you will have to RSVP a definite 'Yes' to this event on Meetup, so that we can filter out any unwanted gatecrashers.

*** VERY IMPORTANT *** VERY IMPORTANT *** VERY IMPORTANT ***

If you want to stay over after the party, you need to make your own hotel reservations:

Hotel rooms are available at the The Westin Boston Waterfront Hotel for $169 (regular price is $399).
To reserve call central reservations at 888-627-7115 and mention The Resolution Ball or Boston Event Guide.
After 12/27 please call the Hotel directly at 617-426-6000.
item.name: New Year's Eve Party - The Resolution Ball
